publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3469 Mr Mark Ruskell: GM-Free Areas—That the Parliament notes the recent ruling of the European Court of Justice against Upper Austria’s law outlawing the cultivation of GM crops; acknowledges the singular lack of demand for GM produce within the European Union; believes that European regions must have the right to determine whether or not they allow GM crops to be grown; congratulates Scottish local authorities that have declared a GM ban, and calls on the Scottish Executive to declare Scotland a GM-free area forthwith.
